name: Garden of Calm
description:
Hiya! this is little game I made for "self-care jam": a fun, low-stress game jam that ran over a week.

Chill out and wander around a little garden~ There's no final objective or a focus on mechanics - I just wanted to making something cute, fun and calming.

I hope you enjoy my little game and please feel free to give any feedback - though keep in mind it was just a quick little project, nothing fancy =)

Music is The Path of the Wind by Joe Hisaishi (from My Neighbour Totoro)
